scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix backend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix backend && npm run test --prefix frontend
scripts.test:all: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run test --prefix backend" "npm run test --prefix frontend"
